body_html: Some python targets are missing the srcs_version="PY2AND3" annotation in the BUILD file. We're working on it. In the meantime, any python target in python/BUILD without this annotation will fail when compiled with python 3.
body_text: Some python targets are missing the srcs_version="PY2AND3" annotation in the BUILD file. We're working on it. In the meantime, any python target in python/BUILD without this annotation will fail when compiled with python 3.
